resources.string: The rules of the \n Jail Poker

There are two players in this game, Even and Odd. Each player can show either one or two fingers. If the sum of the fingers shown is even, Even gets that sum. Otherwise, if the sum is odd, Odd gets it. The first one to get 100 points wins. You are playing for the Even. To play the game, press the button with the number of fingers you want to show as soon as the countdown is finished. Your total score is displayed on top, the history of your and CPU\'s scores are displayed on left and right respectively. Good luck!
